eafe5ff0-4aea-4d6a-a705-aaab655595ed.venue_location: Sunset Garden Estate • Napa Valley, California
eafe5ff0-4aea-4d6a-a705-aaab655595ed.their_story: We can't wait to celebrate our love story with the people who matter most to us. Join us for an unforgettable evening of joy, laughter, and new beginnings.

story_timeline.title: First Meeting
story_timeline.description: We met at a coffee shop in downtown San Francisco on a rainy Tuesday morning. Sarah ordered a lavender latte, and Michael couldn't stop staring at her beautiful smile.

story_timeline.title: First Date
story_timeline.description: Our first official date was a sunset picnic in Golden Gate Park. We talked for hours about our dreams, travels, and favorite books under the stars.

story_timeline.title: Moving In Together
story_timeline.description: After a year of long-distance dating, we decided to take the next step and move in together. Our first apartment was tiny but filled with so much love.

story_timeline.title: The Proposal
story_timeline.description: Michael proposed during our vacation in Santorini, Greece. As the sun set over the Aegean Sea, he got down on one knee with Sarah's grandmother's ring.

story_timeline.title: Our Wedding Day
story_timeline.description: And now, we're ready to say 'I do' surrounded by our family and friends. This is just the beginning of our beautiful journey together.

schedule_events.title: Guests Arrival & Welcome
schedule_events.description: Please arrive by 2:00 PM for welcome drinks and mingling before the ceremony begins.

schedule_events.title: Pre-Ceremony Music
schedule_events.description: Enjoy live acoustic music as guests are seated for the ceremony.

schedule_events.title: Wedding Ceremony
schedule_events.description: The main event! Sarah and Michael exchange vows in our beautiful garden setting.

schedule_events.title: Cocktail Hour & Photos
schedule_events.description: Celebrate with signature cocktails while the wedding party takes photos.

schedule_events.title: Reception Dinner
schedule_events.description: Join us for a three-course dinner featuring locally sourced ingredients.

schedule_events.title: First Dance & Toasts
schedule_events.description: Watch the newlyweds' first dance followed by heartfelt toasts from family and friends.

schedule_events.title: Dancing & Celebration
schedule_events.description: Dance the night away with live music and DJ entertainment.

bridal_party.name: Emily Johnson
bridal_party.description: Sarah's older sister and lifelong confidante. Emily has been there through every milestone and couldn't be more excited to stand by Sarah's side.

bridal_party.name: Jessica Chen
bridal_party.description: Met Sarah in freshman year and they've been inseparable ever since. Jessica brings laughter and adventure to every situation.

bridal_party.name: Amanda Rodriguez
bridal_party.description: Sarah's partner-in-crime at work who became family. Amanda is known for her infectious smile and unwavering loyalty.

bridal_party.name: Sophie Williams
bridal_party.description: Friends since elementary school, Sophie knows all of Sarah's secrets and dreams. Their friendship has stood the test of time.

groom_party.name: David Thompson
groom_party.description: Michael's younger brother and best friend. David has always looked up to Michael and is honored to be his best man on this special day.

groom_party.name: Ryan Mitchell
groom_party.description: Michael's college roommate and adventure partner. Ryan introduced Michael to rock climbing and they've been conquering peaks together ever since.

groom_party.name: James Park
groom_party.description: Started as colleagues but quickly became close friends. James is Michael's go-to person for both professional advice and weekend golf games.

groom_party.name: Alex Turner
groom_party.description: Friends since they were kids in the same neighborhood. Alex and Michael have shared countless memories and adventures growing up together.

registry_items.description: For all our kitchen and cooking needs as we start our married life together.
Home essentials and beautiful pieces to make our house a home.
Everything else we need for our new adventure together.

honeymoon_fund.title: Honeymoon Fund
honeymoon_fund.description: Help us create unforgettable memories on our honeymoon to Japan. Every contribution, big or small, means the world to us!

questions.question: What time should I arrive?
questions.answer: Please arrive by 2:30 PM. The ceremony will begin promptly at 3:00 PM. We recommend arriving 30 minutes early to find parking and get seated comfortably.

questions.question: What is the dress code?
questions.answer: We've requested formal/black-tie optional attire. We encourage elegant wear in garden-friendly footwear as parts of our celebration will be outdoors on grass and pathways.

questions.question: Will the ceremony be indoors or outdoors?
questions.answer: Our ceremony will be held outdoors in the beautiful garden setting at Sunset Garden Estate. Don't worry - we have a covered backup plan in case of inclement weather!

dress_code.title: Dress Code
dress_code.description: Formal/Black Tie Optional. We encourage eleganeeet attire in garden-friendly footwear.

special_roles.name: Lily Chen
special_roles.description: Emily's adorable 7-year-old niece who will sprinkle rose petals down the aisle with the biggest smile.

guestbook_messages.name: Sarah Johnson
guestbook_messages.message: Wishing you both a lifetime of happiness! 💕

guestbook_messages.name: Michael Chen
guestbook_messages.message: So excited to celebrate this special day with you! 🎉

generated_themes.name: batman
generated_themes.user_prompt: get me weddingcard inspired by batman , dark knight film series

theme_data.description: A sophisticated 'Dark Knight' theme, blending deep charcoals and muted navy with elegant typography, evoking Gotham's dramatic aesthetic for a truly cinematic wedding.

generated_themes.name: Burgundy Elegance
generated_themes.user_prompt: Create a rich, elegant theme with deep burgundy (#800020, #8B0000, #722F37) and wine red tones (#9B1B30, #A52A2A). Background should be very light ivory or cream (#FFFFF0, #FFFEF7, #FAF0E6). Primary heading color should be deep burgundy or maroon (#800020, #5D001E) for strong contrast. Text must be dark brown or charcoal (#3E2723, #2C1810, #1A1A1A) for readability on light backgrounds. Accent color should be dark gold or bronze (#B8860B, #CD7F32, #996515) for buttons and highlights. Secondary color should be soft ivory (#FFFFF0, #FFF8DC). Use classic serif font like 'Libre Baskerville', 'Crimson Text', or 'Playfair Display' for headings, and elegant sans-serif like 'Source Sans Pro' or 'Lato' for body text. Gradients should be ivory-to-cream for backgrounds, burgundy-to-gold for buttons. The aesthetic should feel sophisticated, timeless, luxurious, and refined - perfect for a fall or winter formal wedding with rich wine colors and golden accents.

theme_data.description: A sophisticated and luxurious theme evoking a formal fall or winter wedding, combining deep wine-reds and rich golden accents with a soft ivory backdrop for timeless elegance.

theme_data.description: This theme evokes a rich, luxurious elegance with deep maroon and golden accents, set against a soft ivory backdrop. It's sophisticated, timeless, and perfect for a formal fall or winter celebration.
